channel.title: Error
channel.description:
When i ever hit ANY run file it always says click any key to continue any help

I HAVE VISTA.
and this is for everything i run?
any help? I will get my friend to rep the hell out of yuh.

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @newb_pk3r newb pk3r
item.description:
@newb_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“alancarr123, post:15, topic:269151”]Go to enviroment variables then look for CLASSPATH and PATH variables.
The CLASSPATH variable that he said is wrong. Click to edit the CLASSPATH and set it to
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Now edit PATH variable set it to
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin[/quote]

is that correct for update 12?

Read full topic

click new unless you already have them this is the ones on TOP not bottom if you already have click edit and make sure that it looks the same as below

put this
CLASSPATH
es\java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin[/quote]

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @newb_pk3r newb pk3r
item.description:
@newb_pk3r wrote:

Mhk this is a client one. but it does it to all sources AND client.

@echo off
:menu
cls
title Pathushan-Scape
echo Client Tools
echo.
echo R - Run client.
echo C - compile client
echo E - Exit client
echo Thanks For using Pathushan-Scape’s client!
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==C goto compile
if %option%==R goto run
if %option%==r goto run
if %option%==rc goto CR
if %option%==RC goto CR
if %option%==rC goto CR
if %option%==Rc goto CR
if %option%==cr goto CR
if %option%==CR goto CR
if %option%==cR goto CR
if %option%==Cr goto CR
if %option%==e goto exit
if %option%==E goto exit
if %option%==* goto error
goto error
:compile
title Compiler
cls
“D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto menu
:run
cls
title Pathushan-Scape Client
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:CR
title Compile-Run
cls
“D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
title Pathushan-Scape Client
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:exit
cls
exit
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu

Read full topic
